SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT FROM ( SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE 1=1
) FREE WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BNO DESC

SELECT COUNT(BNO) FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND BNO > 0
